skills.name: Go/Golang
skills.explanation: Modern language for building efficient microservices and cloud-native applications with excellent concurrency support.

skills.name: Python
skills.explanation: Primary language for data science, ML/AI development, and backend services. Used extensively for rapid prototyping and production systems.

skills.name: SQL
skills.explanation: Essential for database management and data manipulation, ensuring efficient data retrieval and storage.

skills.name: TensorFlow
skills.explanation: Deep learning framework for building and deploying machine learning models with production-grade reliability.

skills.name: gRPC
skills.explanation: High-performance RPC framework for efficient inter-service communication in microservices architectures.

skills.name: GraphQL
skills.explanation: Query language for APIs that allows clients to request only the data they need, improving performance and flexibility.

skills.name: Microservices Architecture
skills.explanation: Design pattern for building scalable and maintainable applications by breaking them into smaller, independent services.

skills.name: Machine Learning
skills.explanation: Developing predictive models and algorithms for data-driven decision making and automation.

skills.name: Deep Learning
skills.explanation: Advanced machine learning techniques using neural networks for complex data analysis and pattern recognition.

skills.name: Computer Vision
skills.explanation: Enabling machines to interpret and understand visual information from the world, crucial for applications like image recognition and autonomous systems.

skills.name: Data Engineering
skills.explanation: Building robust data pipelines and architectures to support data processing and analytics at scale.

skills.name: LLM (Large Language Models)
skills.explanation: Utilizing large-scale language models for natural language understanding and generation tasks.

skills.name: MySQL
skills.explanation: Advanced relational database system known for its robustness and support for complex queries.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.explanation: NoSQL database for handling large volumes of unstructured data with high scalability.

skills.name: Redis
skills.explanation: In-memory data structure store used as a database, cache, and message broker for high-performance applications.

skills.name: RabbitMQ
skills.explanation: Message broker for enabling asynchronous communication between distributed systems.

skills.name: Google BigQuery
skills.explanation: Serverless, highly scalable, and cost-effective multi-cloud data warehouse for analytics.

skills.name: Docker Swarm
skills.explanation: Container orchestration tool for managing Docker containers in a cluster, ensuring high availability and scalability.

skills.name: Kubernetes
skills.explanation: Industry-standard container orchestration platform for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.

skills.name: Jenkins
skills.explanation: Open-source automation server for building, testing, and deploying software projects.

skills.name: Git
skills.explanation: Version control system for tracking changes in source code during software development.

skills.name: Bitbucket
skills.explanation: Git repository hosting service with built-in CI/CD capabilities.

skills.name: Google Cloud Platform
skills.explanation: Comprehensive cloud computing services platform for building, deploying, and scaling applications.

skills.name: Google Vertex AI
skills.explanation: Managed machine learning platform for building and deploying AI models at scale.

skills.name: Agile
skills.explanation: Agile methodologies for iterative development and continuous improvement, enhancing team collaboration and project delivery.

skills.name: Problem Solving
skills.explanation: Analytical skills for identifying issues and developing effective solutions in complex systems.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Organizational skills for planning, executing, and closing projects efficiently.

skills.name: Remote Teamwork
skills.explanation: Collaboration skills for working effectively in distributed teams using digital tools.

skills.name: Team Leadership
skills.explanation: Leading teams to achieve goals while fostering a positive and productive work environment.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effective verbal and written communication skills for conveying ideas clearly and collaborating with stakeholders.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Ability to share knowledge and mentor others in technical subjects, enhancing team capabilities.
